Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: You need to build up your stronghold again, sweetie-pie, or else I can't promote you.
Talk to Dondos Driler again. He'll tell you what you need...
What? What did you say? You killed Dondos Driler?
Without him, you'll never complete your stronghold, and never advance in House Hlaalu.
Poor dear. You'll just have to be content with your current rank... AND my undying love and affection.
You need to build up your stronghold again, sweetie-pie, or else I can't promote you.
You've done everything you need to do for promotion, dumpling... Except build a stronghold.
Go talk with Dondos Driler at the Hlaalu Council Manor in Balmora. He'll tell you what you need...
What? What did you say? You killed Dondos Driler?
Without him, you'll never complete your stronghold, and never advance in House Hlaalu.
Poor dear. You'll just have to be content with your current rank... AND my undying love and affection.
You've done everything you need to do for promotion, dumpling... Except build a stronghold.
Go talk with Dondos Driler at the Hlaalu Council Manor in Balmora. He'll tell you everything you need to know.
Have you come to challenge me for the title of Arch-Mage?

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: You are qualified, but you must first build a stronghold.
You're out of uniform outlander. Talk to me when you're serious.
If you want me to sponsor you in House Hlaalu, there's a little favor I need you to do for me first...
You've done plenty of chores, but you don't meet our requirements.

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: You are the Grandmaster of House Hlaalu, outlander.
Once our business is concluded, I will consider your advancement.
Once our business is concluded, I will consider your advancement.
I can't advance you if you don't belong to House Hlaalu, can I dear?
You're the new Grandmaster of House Hlaalu, outlander. You even outrank your Uncle Crassius. How much farther do you want to go?
I can't advance you any more, dumpling. You'll need to see Duke Vedam Dren himself to be a Councilor or even Grandmaster.
The Duke is staying in Ebonheart this year. He was the Grandmaster of House Hlaalu, you know, before he inherited his title.
I hate to say it, dumpling, but you've been expelled. You need to make amends with Uncle Crassius.
You'll still have to earn your advancement, dumpling. No, no, no, you can't just wiggle that snug little waist and change my mind this time.

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: You have already risen to the highest rank available to a lay servant of the Imperial cult.
You cannot receive advancement unless you join the Imperial Cult.
You have been expelled from the Imperial cult. I am disappointed, and ashamed for you.
If you want to advance in the service of the Nine, you must dedicate more of your time and resources to serving the cult, and you must strive for personal improvement in your attributes and skills.
Only the most distinguished are worthy of advancement to the higher ranks in the Imperial cult.
I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:

I can tell you more about the Imperial cult ranks and their requirements, if you like.

Perform more jobs for your brother thieves and practice your skills.

I cannot advance you to the next rank. You must find a patron in House Telvanni.
Do you wish to join House Telvanni? You must do this before you can receive advancement.
Oh, you've been expelled. Let me take care of that for you.
Why? You have done nothing towards the next rank. You have neither the chores nor the requirements.
